title: [Oleander Avenue]
description: Three shops on one side of the street have obviously been decorated in relation to one another.  The first has been painted a deep green with white trim, while the other two shops wear lighter shades of the same color.  A pair of miniature evergreen trees, encircled with white satin and velvet ribbon, flank the outside of each doorway.

Three shops on one side of the street have obviously been decorated in relation to one another.  The first has been painted a deep green with white trim, while the other two shops wear lighter shades of the same color.  A painted pattern upon the cobblestones marks the entry to a large woven grass hall, which is flanked by a pair of miniature evergreen trees encircled with white satin and velvet ribbon.
